hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Kinanah b. Abbas ibn Mirdas: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) laughed AbuBakr or Umar said to him: May Allah make your teeth laugh! He then mentioned the tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَقُولُ لِلرَّجُلِ أَضْحَكَ اللَّهُ سِنَّكَ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding saying "May Allah make you smile always"
